testcase.name: Verify available products on inventory page
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify available products on inventory page Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 4.956s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.059s Then User should see 6 products listed ... passed in 0.025s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Sort products by different options -- @1.1
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: Sort products by different options -- @1.1 Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 4.928s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.059s When the user sorts products by 'az' ... passed in 2.471s Then the products should be sorted by 'name ascending' order ... passed in 0.009s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: Sort products by different options -- @1.2 Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 4.933s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.057s When the user sorts products by 'za' ... passed in 2.450s Then the products should be sorted by 'name descending' order ... passed in 0.008s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Logout from inventory page
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Logout from inventory page Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 4.993s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.064s When user logs out from the application ... passed in 2.403s Then user should be redirected to the login page ... passed in 0.005s
